transArray.content: The room is nice and worth recommending.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your encouragement is very important. If life is a journey, we would like to be your warmest stop. If meeting is a ballad, we would like to be a note of happiness for you. We miss you. Write down your feelings in the notes. Friends, I look forward to meeting you next time at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. I wish you all the best! Manager: Zhao Dan
